name: Squat
description: Back squat focusing on quads and glutes. Lower body until thighs are parallel to floor, then drive up through heels.

name: Deadlift
description: Conventional deadlift from the floor. Hinge at hips, keep back straight, drive through heels.

name: Bench Press
description: Flat bench press with barbell. Lower bar to chest, press up explosively.

name: Overhead Press
description: Standing press with full lockout overhead. Keep core tight, press straight up.

name: Bent-Over Row
description: Row focusing on mid-back engagement. Hinge forward, pull bar to lower chest.

name: Pull-Up
description: Pronated grip pull-up to bar. Pull until chin clears bar, lower with control.

name: Dip
description: Parallel bar dips with upright torso. Lower until shoulders below elbows, press up.

name: Lunge
description: Alternating walking lunges. Step forward, lower back knee, drive up.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: Hip hinge Romanian deadlift. Keep legs straight, hinge at hips, feel hamstring stretch.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Wide grip pulldown to chest. Pull bar to upper chest, squeeze lats.

name: Cable Row
description: Seated cable row with neutral grip. Pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Leg Press
description: 45-degree sled leg press. Lower until knees at 90 degrees, press up.

name: Calf Raise
description: Standing calf raise machine. Rise onto toes, lower slowly.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Alternating dumbbell curl. Keep elbows fixed, curl to shoulder.

name: Tricep Extension
description: Cable rope tricep pushdown. Keep elbows at sides, extend fully.

name: Push-Up
description: Standard push-up. Lower chest to floor, press up explosively.

name: Plank
description: Forearm plank. Keep body straight, hold position.

name: Leg Curl
description: Seated or lying leg curl. Curl heels to glutes, squeeze hamstrings.

name: Shoulder Press
description: Seated or standing dumbbell shoulder press. Press overhead, lower with control.

name: Lateral Raise
description: Standing lateral raise. Raise arms to sides until parallel to floor.
